name: クリスタリス モートゥス
description: モートゥスは魔法と一体になった世界だったが、「粛清」の後にすべてが崩壊した。それから数世紀、文明は疎らとなり、街には再び草木が生い茂った。そして、魔法がプリズマエ・クリスタルとなって復活した。プリズマエ・クリスタルが求めていることは一つ、それは世界に広がることだ。その力を安全に利用できる者もいたが、その力に引き寄せられ、取り込まれる者もいた──プリズマエ戦争の始まりである。

skins.name: クリスタリス モートゥス アッシュ

wikiSkinData.lore: Ashe's retreat from her northern homeland was not due to any invasion, but the Prismae Crystals. In such a harsh environment, their power was difficult to resist, leading many to lose their minds and bodies to its magic. Forced to find shelter in the south, Ashe now gathers an army to take back her home from the monsters that overrun it.

skins.name: クリスタリス モートゥス レオナ

wikiSkinData.lore: Leona knows what caused the purge: blasphemy. Magic's disappearance was retribution for humanity's arrogance and misuse of it. As a worshipper of the Prismae Crystals, she believes it's her sacred duty to protect them. But she also prays to them in secret, hoping they'll bring back her lost love, Diana, who disappeared after journeying to the north.

skins.name: クリスタリス モートゥス タリヤ

wikiSkinData.lore: When the Prismae Crystals began to appear, everyone on Motus reacted differently. Locked to their island, Taliyah's people viewed them not as a threat, but as an extension of nature. Now in symbiotic harmony with the crystals on their bodies, Taliyah's people are stronger than ever, and she ventures to the mainland to put her powers to the test.
